review: I got this for a tv in one of my bedrooms that my teenage granddaughter uses when she visits.  This is  great as it allows her to access my subscriptions (Netflix, Amazon Prime and Hulu) and I don't have to have another cable outlet installed.
author: susan b. ray

review: We love the Firestick. It was very easy to install and use. We are retired on a fixed income, so we don't rent many movies. A lot of the free ones are notvery good.  but you can still fine something worthwhile.
author: pet lover

review: I thought there would be newer movies quicker but this works well.  I tried a Google Chrome but it was not compatible with my Kindle so this was a steal for me.  I got it for only $19, preordering it.
author: Jo Ann Houghton

review: Worked great for a couple weeks, but I haven't been able to connect for quite a while.  I keep getting an "authentication problem" in the network settings even though it says there is a very good WIFI signal.  I tried resetting everything but nothing ever works.  Turned out to be a waste of money.
author: Keith Mize

review: Had been thinking about getting fire stick since it first came out. Wish I had made purchase sooner. It was easy to set up and works flawlessly with Amazon prime as well as other apps such as Hulu.
author: Donald Davis

review: Poor choice for watching Netflix.  HBO Go works fine, but Netflix stops every 30 seconds to buffer.
author: Glenn Siegert

review: Maybe my wireless internet but it sometimes stops in he middle of a movie
author: Rita Oliver
